document.title: Health Education Content Standards for California Public Schools, Kindergarten Through Grade Twelve

F9A91490DFE3013192BD68A86D17958E.description: Object appropriately to teasing or bullying of peers that is based on personal characteristics and perceived sexual orientation.

F9A8CFF0DFE3013192BC68A86D17958E.description: Encourage a school environment that is respectful of individual differences.

F9A88B00DFE3013192BB68A86D17958E.description: Health Promotion - All students will demonstrate the ability to promote and support personal, family, and community health.
comments: Personal, family, and community health are interdependent and mutually supporting. The ability to promote the health of oneself and others reflects a well-rounded development and expression of health.

F9A84760DFE3013192BA68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate how to use self-control when angry.

F9A80250DFE3013192B968A86D17958E.description: Practice appropriate ways to respect and include others who are different from oneself.

F9A76F70DFE3013192B768A86D17958E.description: Carry out personal and social responsibilities appropriately.

F9A72670DFE3013192B668A86D17958E.description: Practicing Health-Enhancing Behaviors - All students will demonstrate the ability to practice behaviors that reduce risk and promote health.
comments: Practicing healthy behaviors builds competence and confidence to use learned skills in real-life situations. The ability to adopt health-enhancing behaviors demonstrates students' ability to use knowledge and skills to manage health and reduce risk-taking behaviors.

F9A6DCF0DFE3013192B568A86D17958E.description: Make a personal commitment to avoid persons, places, or activities that encourage violence or delinquency

F9A690A0DFE3013192B468A86D17958E.description: Describe how personal goals can be affected if violence is used to solve problems.

F9A64900DFE3013192B368A86D17958E.description: Make a plan to prevent and manage stress.

F9A60060DFE3013192B268A86D17958E.description: Goal Setting - All students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.
comments: The desire to pursue health is an essential component of building healthy habits. The ability to use goal-setting skills enables students to translate health knowledge into personally meaningful health behaviors.

F9A5B080DFE3013192B168A86D17958E.description: Compare and contrast being angry and angry behavior, and discuss the consequences.

F9A56AA0DFE3013192B068A86D17958E.description: Describe situations for which someone should seek help with stress, loss, and depression.

F9A522D0DFE3013192AF68A86D17958E.description: Apply a decision-making process to enhance health.

F9A4B5C0DFE3013192AE68A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F9A46F70DFE3013192AD68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate the ability to use steps of conflict resolution.

F9A42480DFE3013192AC68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate ways to communicate respect for diversity

F9A3C9B0DFE3013192AB68A86D17958E.description: Describe how prejudice, discrimination, and bias can lead to violence.

F9A38370DFE3013192AA68A86D17958E.description: Practice asking for help with mental, emotional, or social health problems from trusted adults.

F9A33860DFE3013192A968A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F9A2F2E0DFE3013192A868A86D17958E.description: Discuss the importance of getting help from a trusted adult when it is needed.

F9A2AB90DFE3013192A768A86D17958E.description: Identify sources of valid information and services for getting help with mental, emotional, and social health problems.

F9A25C90DFE3013192A668A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F9A202F0DFE3013192A568A86D17958E.description: Analyze the external and internal influences on mental, emotional, and social health.

F9A1ABB0DFE3013192A468A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F9A151E0DFE3013192A368A86D17958E.description: Discuss the harmful effects of violent behaviors.

F9A104F0DFE3013192A268A86D17958E.description: Describe the similarities between types of violent behaviors (e.g., bullying, hazing, fighting, and verbal abuse).

F9A0BA20DFE3013192A168A86D17958E.description: Describe the importance of setting personal boundaries for privacy, safety, and expressions of emotions and opinions.

F9A066E0DFE3013192A068A86D17958E.description: Explain why getting help for mental, emotional, and social health problems is appropriate and necessary.

F99FFD90DFE30131929F68A86D17958E.description: Describe the importance of being empathetic to individual differences, including people with disabilities and chronic diseases.

F99FBBD0DFE30131929E68A86D17958E.description: Describe the importance of being aware of one's emotions.

F99F7930DFE30131929D68A86D17958E.description: Discuss how emotions change during adolescence.

F99F35B0DFE30131929C68A86D17958E.description: Summarize feelings and emotions associated with loss and grief.

F99EF160DFE30131929B68A86D17958E.description: Describe the signs, causes, and health effects of stress, loss, and depression.

F99EAB90DFE30131929A68A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.

F99E12B0DFE30131929868A86D17958E.description: Practice effective persuasion skills for encouraging others not to use alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.

F99DCBC0DFE30131929768A86D17958E.description: Health Promotion - All students will demonstrate the ability to promote and support personal, family, and community health.
comments: Personal, family, and community health are interdependent and mutually supporting. The ability to promote the health of oneself and others reflects a well-rounded development and expression of health.

F99D8800DFE30131929668A86D17958E.description: Practice positive alternatives to using alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.

F99D4030DFE30131929568A86D17958E.description: Practicing Health-Enhancing Behaviors - All students will demonstrate the ability to practice behaviors that reduce risk and promote health.
comments: Practicing healthy behaviors builds competence and confidence to use learned skills in real-life situations. The ability to adopt health-enhancing behaviors demonstrates students' ability to use knowledge and skills to manage health and reduce risk-taking behaviors.

F99CF320DFE30131929468A86D17958E.description: Develop personal goals to remain drug-free.

F99CA630DFE30131929368A86D17958E.description: Goal Setting - All students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.
comments: The desire to pursue health is an essential component of building healthy habits. The ability to use goal-setting skills enables students to translate health knowledge into personally meaningful health behaviors.

F99C4590DFE30131929268A86D17958E.description: Analyze the legal, emotional, social, and health consequences of using alcohol and other drugs.

F99BFA90DFE30131929168A86D17958E.description: Analyze the kinds of situations involving alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs for which help from an adult should be requested.

F99BB130DFE30131929068A86D17958E.description: Analyze how decisions to use alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs will affect relationships with friends and family.

F99B62E0DFE30131928F68A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F99B19B0DFE30131928E68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate effective verbal and nonverbal refusal skills to resist the pressure to use alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.

F99AC770DFE30131928D68A86D17958E.description: Use effective verbal communication skills to avoid situations where alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs are being used.

F99A7B50DFE30131928C68A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F99A3650DFE30131928B68A86D17958E.description: Identify sources of valid information regarding alcohol, tobacco, and other drug use and abuse.

F999EDF0DFE30131928A68A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F999A500DFE30131928968A86D17958E.description: Explain how culture and media influence the use of alcohol and other drugs.

F9995F70DFE30131928868A86D17958E.description: Analyze how impaired judgment and other effects of using alcohol or marijuana impact personal safety, relationships with friends and families, school success, and attainment of present and future goals.

F9991290DFE30131928768A86D17958E.description: Analyze the influence of marketing and advertising techniques, including the use of role models and how they affect use of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.

F998C3C0DFE30131928668A86D17958E.description: Describe internal influences that affect the use of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.

F99880F0DFE30131928568A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F9983DE0DFE30131928468A86D17958E.description: Identify the effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drug use on physical activity, including athletic performance.

F997F1E0DFE30131928368A86D17958E.description: Explain the stages of drug dependence and addiction and the effects of drugs on the adolescent brain.

F997A660DFE30131928268A86D17958E.description: Explain the dangers of secondhand smoke.

F9975260DFE30131928168A86D17958E.description: Identify the benefits of a tobacco-free environment.

F996FF90DFE30131928068A86D17958E.description: Differentiate between the use and misuse of prescription and nonprescription medicines.

F996BE20DFE30131927F68A86D17958E.description: Identify positive alternatives to alcohol, tobacco, and other drug use.

F9967A80DFE30131927E68A86D17958E.description: Explain short- and long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, inhalant, and other drug use, including social, legal, and economic implications.

F99632C0DFE30131927D68A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.

F9958990DFE30131927B68A86D17958E.description: Encourage others to practice safe behaviors, including the proper use of safety belts when riding in cars, wearing helmets when riding bicycles, and wearing mouth guards when participating in athletic activities.

F99536C0DFE30131927A68A86D17958E.description: Promote a bully-free school and community environment.

F994EE20DFE30131927968A86D17958E.description: Support injury prevention at school, at home, and in the community.

F99496B0DFE30131927868A86D17958E.description: Health Promotion - All students will demonstrate the ability to promote and support personal, family, and community health.
comments: Personal, family, and community health are interdependent and mutually supporting. The ability to promote the health of oneself and others reflects a well-rounded development and expression of health.

F9945050DFE30131927768A86D17958E.description: Practice basic first aid and emergency procedures.

F9940AC0DFE30131927668A86D17958E.description: Practice positive alternatives to gang involvement.

F99370F0DFE30131927468A86D17958E.description: Practice ways to resolve conflicts nonviolently.

F9932C60DFE30131927368A86D17958E.description: Practicing Health-Enhancing Behaviors - All students will demonstrate the ability to practice behaviors that reduce risk and promote health.
comments: Practicing healthy behaviors builds competence and confidence to use learned skills in real-life situations. The ability to adopt health-enhancing behaviors demonstrates students' ability to use knowledge and skills to manage health and reduce risk-taking behaviors.

F992E2F0DFE30131927268A86D17958E.description: Develop a personal plan to remain safe and injury-free.

F9929670DFE30131927168A86D17958E.description: Goal Setting - All students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.
comments: The desire to pursue health is an essential component of building healthy habits. The ability to use goal-setting skills enables students to translate health knowledge into personally meaningful health behaviors.

F9924320DFE30131927068A86D17958E.description: Use a decision-making process to determine appropriate strategies for responding to bullying and harassment.

F991E490DFE30131926F68A86D17958E.description: Use a decision-making process to determine a safe course of action in risky situations.

F99198B0DFE30131926E68A86D17958E.description: Decision Making - All students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Managing health behaviors requires critical thinking and problem solving. The ability to use decision-making skills to guide health behaviors fosters a sense of control and promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility.

F9915760DFE30131926D68A86D17958E.description: Practice communication and refusal skills to avoid gang involvement.

F9911530DFE30131926C68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate escape strategies for situations in which weapons or other dangerous objects are present.

F990D080DFE30131926B68A86D17958E.description: Explain the importance of immediately reporting a weapon that is found or is in the possession of peers.

F99085F0DFE30131926A68A86D17958E.description: Practice effective communication skills to prevent and avoid risky situations.

F99026F0DFE30131926968A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication - All students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health.
comments: Positive relationships support the development of healthy attitudes and behaviors. The ability to appropriately convey and receive information, beliefs, and emotions is a skill that enables students to manage risk, conflict, and differences and to promote health.

F98FCD20DFE30131926868A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate the ability to ask a trusted adult for help when feeling personally threatened or unsafe, including while using the Internet.

F98F8B10DFE30131926768A86D17958E.description: Identify rules and laws intended to prevent injuries.

F98F45F0DFE30131926668A86D17958E.description: Accessing Valid Information - All students will demonstrate the ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services.
comments: Students are exposed to numerous sources of information, products, and services. The ability to access and analyze health information, products, and services provides a foundation for practicing health-enhancing behaviors. Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F98F02A0DFE30131926568A86D17958E.description: Analyze personal behaviors that may lead to injuries or cause harm.

F98EBEF0DFE30131926468A86D17958E.description: Analyze influences on both safe and violent behaviors.

F98E6CF0DFE30131926368A86D17958E.description: Analyze the role of self and others in causing or preventing injuries.

F98E1D90DFE30131926268A86D17958E.description: Analyzing Influences - All students will demonstrate the ability to analyze internal and external influences that affect health.
comments: Health choices are affected by a variety of influences. The ability to recognize, analyze, and evaluate internal and external influences is essential to protecting and enhancing health.

F98DD5C0DFE30131926168A86D17958E.description: Describe how the presence of weapons increases the risk of serious violent injuries.

F98D8DB0DFE30131926068A86D17958E.description: Describe hazards related to sun, water, and ice.

F98D4040DFE30131925F68A86D17958E.description: Discuss safety hazards related to Internet usage.

F98CEA40DFE30131925E68A86D17958E.description: Examine safety procedures when using public transportation and traveling in vehicles.

F98C99C0DFE30131925D68A86D17958E.description: Examine the risks of possessing a weapon at home, at school, and in the community.

F98C4370DFE30131925C68A86D17958E.description: Examine disaster preparedness plans for the home and school.

F98BFAA0DFE30131925B68A86D17958E.description: Describe the risks of gang involvement.

F98BB5D0DFE30131925A68A86D17958E.description: Describe basic first aid and emergency procedures, including those for accidental loss of or injuries to teeth.

F98B6C70DFE30131925968A86D17958E.description: Explain methods to reduce conflict, harassment, and violence.

F98B1BB0DFE30131925868A86D17958E.description: Essential Concepts - All students will comprehend essential concepts related to enhancing health.
comments: Understanding essential concepts about the relationships between behavior and health provides the foundation for making informed decisions about health-related behaviors and for selecting appropriate health products and services.
